links.*: Of the Voyage of Eärendil and the War of Wrath
The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|527|532|534|538|540|542|545}}
* The [[Third Kinslaying]]: the remaining [[Sons of Fëanor|sons]] of [[Fëanor]], desiring the [[Silmaril]], attack the remnants of [[Doriath]] and [[Gondolin]] at the [[Mouths of Sirion|New Havens]].<ref name="Years">{{WJ|Years}}, p. 348</ref>
* [[Círdan]] and [[Gil-galad]] send aid to the Havens. They arrive too late and the people are defeated; the refugees move to the [[Isle of Balar]].<ref name="Earendil">{{S|Earendil}}</ref>
* Death of [[Amrod]] and [[Amras]].<ref name="Earendil"/>
* [[Elrond]] and [[Elros]] are taken captive by [[Maglor]], but Maglor comes to love the boys and fosters them.<ref name="Earendil"/>
* [[Elwing]], bearing the Silmaril, casts herself into [[Belegaer|the sea]]. [[Ulmo]] bears her up in the likeness of a swan and she finds [[Eärendil]].<ref name="Years"/>

{{references}}
